title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 91.7 - Form of uniform traffic ticket
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 91.7 - Form of uniform traffic ticket

State Regulations

Uniform traffic tickets conforming to the specifications
set forth in section
91.5
of this Part must be in the
following form. No variations from the format prescribed herein shall be
permitted unless prior written approval is obtained from the
commissioner. (a) Part I. (1)

Part I of the packet is the ticket, and
is given to the alleged violator. (2)

It shall be printed on canary
stock. (3)

The following
instruction shall be printed in red, in uppercase characters, in boldface
12-point type: "A PLEA OF GUILTY TO THIS CHARGE IS EQUIVALENT TO A
CONVICTION AFTER TRIAL. IF YOU ARE CONVICTED, NOT ONLY WILL YOU BE LIABLE TO A
PENALTY, BUT IN ADDITION YOUR LICENSE TO DRIVE A MOTOR VEHICLE OR MOTORCYCLE, AND YOUR CERTIFICATE OF REGISTRATION, IF ANY, ARE SUBJECT TO SUSPENSION AND
REVOCATION AS PRESCRIBED BY LAW."
(4)

The reverse side of this part shall
contain the form prescribed by the commissioner to be used in disposing of
certain traffic infractions by mail, and may at the option of the enforcement
agency contain information with respect to schedules of fines and other
information applying to a specific local area. (5)

It shall be printed in substantially the
following form: (i) Front. Image

Image
(ii)

Reverse. Image

Image
(b) Part II. (1)

Part II of the packet is the simplified
traffic information, and after having been verified or affirmed by the officer
is delivered to the court in which the alleged violator is notified to
appear. (2)

It shall be printed on
salmon stock. (3)

It shall be
printed in substantially the following form*: Image

Image
(i) Front. Image
(ii)

Reverse. Image
(d) Part IV. (1)

Part IV of the packet is the enforcement
agency copy and is delivered by the police officer to the court in which the
alleged violator is notified to appear. (2)

It shall be printed on blue
stock. (3)

It shall be printed in
substantially the following form*: Image
(e) Part V. (1)

Part V of the packet is the officer's
copy and is retained by the police officer or the enforcement agency. (2)

It shall be printed on green
stock. (3)

Report of action and
officer's notes shall be printed on the reverse of this part. The amount of
space provided for this purpose is optional with the enforcement agency. Additional information may be printed on the reverse of this part at the option
of the enforcement agency. (4)

It
shall be printed in substantially the following form [FN1]: (i) Front. Image
(ii)

Reverse. Image
[FN1] All material printed on the front of part I in
accordance with footnotes 1-5 also be printed on part V. Notes

ยง
91.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
